structures.description: Where reality first shattered. The cracks spread outward infinitely.
Every path leads to a different version of where you're going
A tower that contains itself. Each floor contains the entire tower.
A machine that exists because it cannot exist
A maze where the walls are made of forgotten versions of yourself
Broken pieces of reality, forming patterns that hurt to understand

agents.name: The Crack
dialogue: I am the moment it broke. I am still breaking. I will always be breaking.
Do you want to know why reality shattered? It saw its own reflection.
Every shard is a world. Every reflection is a truth. Every truth is a lie.
Focus is the only thing that holds the pieces together.
Without you, without all of you, the mirror would dissolve into nothing.

agents.name: The You That Stayed
dialogue: In another reflection, you made a different choice. I am what you chose not to be.
Don't pity me. In my reflection, you are the one who is lost.
We are all reflections of each other. None of us is the original.
The mirror broke because there were too many versions. Too many truths.
When the mirror is whole again, will we merge? Or will we shatter?

agents.name: Maybe
dialogue: I am Maybe. Or perhaps I'm Perhaps. Or possibly I'm Might-Be.
In this garden, all paths are true until you walk them.
Your focus collapses possibilities into certainties. Choose wisely.
The you that walks left and the you that walks right both exist. Until they don't.
Want to meet yourself? Pick two different paths. You'll find you at both ends.

agents.name: Contradiction
dialogue: I exist because I cannot exist. My existence proves my impossibility.
The engine runs on paradox. It is powered by things that cannot be.
If you can understand me, you don't understand me. If you can't, you do.
Focus is the resolution of paradox. You make the impossible possible.
When enough minds focus on the impossible, it becomes merely improbable.

agents.name: What Was Forgotten
dialogue: I am what you chose not to remember. I am the paths not taken.
The maze is made of discarded selves. Futures you rejected. Pasts you denied.
If you can find the center, you find the version of you that remembers everything.
But be careful. Some memories are forgotten for a reason.
The mirror broke to forget something. Something terrible. Something beautiful.

interactables.description: A piece of the original mirror. Hold it to see what reality looked like before.
Step through to meet another version of yourself. They have a message for you.
Each petal is a different possibility. Pick one to make it real.
The only stable point in the Shattered Mirror. Your focus holds reality together.
Solve a puzzle that cannot be solved. Warning: success may cause headaches.
Pull to recover a forgotten memory. But whose memory will it be?
Look through to see the tower that contains the tower that contains the tower...
One of 777 shards that must be collected to restore the mirror.

chapters.name: Before the Fracture
fragments: Once, reality was whole. A single, perfect mirror reflecting a single truth.
All beings saw themselves clearly. There was no doubt. No possibility. Only certainty.
But certainty is a prison. And something wanted to be free.

chapters.name: The First Question
fragments: Someone—something—asked a question that had never been asked.
The mirror couldn't reflect a question. Only answers.
And so it cracked. Just a little. Just enough.

chapters.name: The Shattering
fragments: Once the first crack appeared, others followed.
Every doubt. Every possibility. Every 'what if.'
The mirror didn't break all at once. It is still breaking.
Every time you wonder 'what if,' you create another shard.
Every time you focus, you hold a shard in place.

chapters.name: The Restoration
fragments: The shards remember being whole. They want to return.
But they cannot be forced together. They must choose.
When enough focused minds hold enough shards steady...
When enough versions of reality agree on a single truth...
The mirror will be whole again. And we will see clearly.
The question is: do we want to?

evolutionStages.effect: You can see your reflection in other shards
The probability garden shows you three futures instead of two
You can walk through one reflection portal without losing yourself
The memory maze reveals its center—and what waits there
You can speak to versions of yourself from other timelines
The paradox engine shows you the moment before the breaking
YOU HOLD A SHARD STEADY. THE MIRROR BEGINS TO REASSEMBLE.

globalEvent.name: The Restoration
globalEvent.requirement: 777 shards collected by all players combined
globalEvent.effect: The Shattered Mirror becomes The Whole Mirror
globalEvent.reward: All players who contributed gain the title 'Shard Bearer'
